title: I can't get Honor Capsule!
body:
**So guys i cannot recive a Honor Capsule after being Honor Level 3 for 5 days. I got honored by a lot of players and i actualy made a penta if it is for the playing, but i still cannot recive one while my friend got 2 of them in 3 day... I dont know what is it but im i going to recive a honor capsule? If you know how is this going be free to tell me. 
Ty**

replies.body:
Honor Capsules are just like keys! They will drop at random and not after a set amount of days. it sounds like you're on the right path to having some drop for you though! Keep up the good work and congratulations on reach honor LvL 3! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I feel this is severely untrue being that I am honor 4 and have only received about 6 key fragments and 0 capsules since honor 3. Am I just the unluckiest person in the world or is the system bugged?
can riot make it so it has a better chance of dropping it was way to rare for what it is worth

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GsE6kJkA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-08T21:25:40.232+0000)
>
> Honor Capsules are just like keys! They will drop at random and not after a set amount of days. it sounds like you're on the right path to having some drop for you though! Keep up the good work and congratulations on reach honor LvL 3! 
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Ty so much for that info and let's hope i get a capsule. :D
i have been hornor 5 for months but i havent got one yet
im not recieveing any rewards as well and its frustrating as hell im honor lvl3 i been playing on daily basis got nothing for almost a week
i am lvl 5 for a long time and all  i get are keys fragments for once i just want a capsule
all i want is that ww skin but riots hates me like always
Im lvl honor 5, and i dont get capsule also, like two lvls i dont get anything.. I get only at lvl 3 and then nothing happend when i get lvl 4 so..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
ikr same im honor 5 and i get 1 key fragment every week or something its so annoying
i got honor lvl 3 and nothing.. all my friends got it and then i got honor lvl4 and 2 keys at the same time.. but all my 5 frends got capsuls so wtf?
